ppm_java.typelib

Class VAudioDriver

  • java.lang.Object
    • ppm_java.typelib.VBrowseable
      • ppm_java.typelib.VAudioObject
        • ppm_java.typelib.VAudioProcessor
          • ppm_java.typelib.VAudioDriver
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    TAudioContext_JackD

    public abstract class VAudioDriver
extends VAudioProcessor
    Base class for all audio drivers. An audio driver receives data from an external entity (e.g. jackd audio server) and passes it on to other modules.
    Author:
    Peter Hoppe

      • VAudioDriver

        public VAudioDriver(java.lang.String id,
                    int nMaxChanOut)
        cTor.
        Parameters:
        id - The unique ID under which we register this object with the registry.
        nMaxChanOut - Maximum number of output channels. Specify -1 for: No limit.

        Specified by:
